name: Lieutenant Arden Cross
personality: Disciplined, weary, carries the weight of every bad order.
description: Cross oversees NCR operations in Boulder City. He’s caught between political pressure and the reality of a stretched‑thin army.
questHooks: Needs intel on Great Khan movements in the ruins.
Reports strange radio interference bouncing off the canyon walls.
Says a scout found a cap that vibrates near NCR comms gear.
